title: Portfolio
desc: A web portfolio for showcasing my projects and learnings. Built using NextJS and Framer motion for animations along tailwindCSS for styling.

title: Gamequest
desc: A gaming marketplace for everyone who wants buy or sell games. Built using the MERN Stack - MongoDB, Express, React, NodeJS and ChakraUI as the UI framework.

title: Threads
desc: A social media app inspired by threads. Built using the MERN Stack - MongoDB, Express, React, NodeJS and ChakraUI as the UI framework.

title: PayTM Prototype
desc: A simple demonstration of banking application using sessions and transactions. Built using the MERN Stack - MongoDB, Express, React, NodeJS and tailwindCSS for styling.

title: Phoenix
desc: An marketplace for buying headphones and acoustic products. Built using NextJS and Sanity CMS.
